title: From Tatas to Ambanis to Birlas, big corporates are hungry for restaurant business
description: Big corporate houses like Aditya Birla, Reliance and Tata Group are investing in the Indian restaurant industry. They see opportunities in the growing, lucrative market following the pandemic. Companies are focusing on scalability and standardisation. Rising disposable incomes and new experiences drive the shift, with consumers dining out more frequently.
